data.title: Bitcoin rebounds, Bank of Japan weighs hike, Sam Altman's 'code red'
data.description: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman breaks down the top headlines in premarket trading on December 2, 2025. Yahoo Finance's expert panel comes on the program to talk about the latest news around US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) this morning, bitcoin's price moves (BTC-USD), and the Bank of Japan considering its options to hike interest rates in December. JonesTrading Chief Market Strategist Michael O'Rourke sticks around for a discussion about the competition growing in the AI space that could challenge OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
data.keywords: premarket trading, Julie Hyman, Bank of Japan, US stock futures, Michael O'Rourke
